metadata.name: Babak Karimi #1
metadata.description:
The first strait movie collection was created with the aim of advancing the post-production stages of this movie. We hope to get the necessary funds for the post-production stage through the release and sale of the first series of this collection, which consists of behind-the-scenes images.
This film is one of the hopes of participating in prestigious festivals such as Berlin, Clermont, Locarno, Chicago, etc. and will try to reach the Academy Awards.


This movie tells the story of two teenage boys who try to get rich through an unusual way.

Production days:
The film was shot in 40 days and has been made with a budget of 120 thousand dollars so far. Meghdad Jalali, an independent writer and director, was the leader of the group and Babak Karimi, a movie star and winner of the Best Actor Bear at the Berlin Festival, with the successful experience of attending the Oscars three times with Asghar Farhadi's films, plays a role in the movie The Strait.
